mapper.insert: INSERT INTO usereyeinfo(user_id, total_operating_time, total_blink_times, warning_count, blink_cycle) VALUES(#{userId}, #{totalOperatingTime}, #{totalBlinkTimes}, #{warningCount}, #{blinkCycle})
mapper.update: UPDATE usereyeinfo SET total_operating_time = #{totalOperatingTime}, total_blink_times = #{totalBlinkTimes}, warning_count = #{warningCount}, blink_cycle = #{blinkCycle} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT ranking FROM ( SELECT user_id, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY CASE WHEN warning_count = 0 THEN total_operating_time ELSE total_operating_time DIV warning_count END DESC, CASE WHEN warning_count = 0 THEN warning_count END DESC ) AS 'ranking' FROM eyeloveyoudb.usereyeinfo ) ranked WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT ROUND(perminute, 2) FROM ( SELECT user_id, total_operating_time, total_blink_times, (total_blink_times / total_operating_time) * 60 AS perminute FROM eyeloveyoudb.usereyeinfo ) per WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT ROUND(perminute, 2) FROM ( SELECT user_id, total_operating_time, warning_count, (warning_count / total_operating_time) * 60 AS perminute FROM eyeloveyoudb.usereyeinfo ) per WHERE user_id = #{userId}
